result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

email correspondence from DC/SCSD/Clerk of Courts-bond not posted, defendant did not surrender self.  Bench warrant to issue.

UNSIGNED-signed and posted by 3pm on Friday 10/14/22

2:52 PM Defendant Leah Rose Truettner appeared by video.  Attorney Jeffrey A Jaeger appeared by video for Leah Rose Truettner.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. State motions to modify bond due to day report. Atty Jaeger filed treatment letter from CORE. Defendant has picked up new charges. State requests a $3,000 cash bond be imposed. Defense requests the signature bond remain as defendant is now in out patient treatment. Court orders $3,000 cash bond and amends the conditions. Defendant to report by 3pm on Friday, 10/14/22 to pay and sign bond or surrender to the SC jail. BW to issue if not complied with.
Plea hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

9:57 AM Prosecuting attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Leah Rose Truettner appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jeffrey A Jaeger appeared by video for Leah Rose Truettner. Supplemental bond amendment provided by Atty Jaeger.  Missing rules/regulations from Frontline Harvest Ministry.  Atty Jaeger forwarded an email from the Frontline representative re: their program. Manitowoc case has resolved w/probation. Court converts cash bond to a signature bond and adds GPS monitoring.  Not to be released from jail w/o signature of bond and equip with a GPS device. Mother will transport to treatment facility.
